item.description: In part 1, I talked about why you should implement a usage-based pricing model, now let’s get into the meat of how you actually implement one.

item.title: Use It or Lose It: Why Usage-Based Pricing (Part 1)
item.description:
Inspired much by the success of companies like Snowflake, Observe Inc. set out to build a usage based pricing model. I’ve learned a ton from this process and continue to do so each week. This blog series will catalog our journey and things I wish we had known on day 1. It’s broken up into 3 parts:

  1. Why Usage Based Pricing?
  2. How you implement it
  3. Its challenges

item.title: Startup Tooling
item.description: As the first product hire at Observe Inc., I was tasked with bringing in a lot of tooling to solve problems. I’ve put together this list in the hopes of making the journey easier for others. Feel free to submit a PR if there’s more you think I should add.
